steps.text: Clean new external composite surface with approved cleaner to remove mold release materials.
Sand old or new gelcoat to remove surface imperfections using a DA sander and 3M Hookit 775L Cubitron II abrasive discs, grade 80+.
Apply dry guide coat to surface and re-sand to ensure an even texture.
Clean repair area with approved cleaner or blow off using pressured air.
Mix and apply 3M™ Marine Blister Repair Filler, fill 85% of the cavity.
Wait 30 minutes.
Feather the repair with 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II abrasive disc, grade 80+.
Apply dry guide coat and re-sand.
Clean the area.
Mix and apply 3M™ Marine Premium Filler.
Wait for filler to cure.
Sand with 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II grade 120+ abrasive discs.
Finish by sanding the repair area with 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II grade 220+.
Use 3M™ Sander.
Ensure surface is dry.
Mask areas with 3M™ Precision Masking Tape.
Back up masking tape with 3M™ Performance Industrial Masking Tape or 3M Scotch® Performance Masking Tape.
Mask entire surface with 3M™ Purple Premium Plus Masking Film.
Mix gelcoat in 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 disposable spray cup.
Adjust 3M™ Performance Spray Gun settings.
Hold spray gun 15cm-20cm from surface and apply gelcoat.
Clean the new external composite surface with approved cleaner.
If needed, sand with 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II 320+ and then 400+ grade abrasives with a Soft Interface Pad.
If the surface is in good condition, start with P800 grade 3M™ Hookit™ Flexible Abrasive Foam Discs.
Refine the P800 grade sand scratch using P1200 grade 3M™ Hookit™ Flexible Abrasive Foam Discs.
Compound the surface with 3M™ Perfect-It™ Gelcoat Heavy Cutting Compound and a 3M™ Perfect-It™ Low Linting Wool Compounding Pad.
Use a Rotary Polishing machine at 1400-1800 rpm.
Polish with 3M™ Perfect-It™ Gelcoat Compound + Polish and a wool compounding pad at 1400-1800 rpm.
Apply 3M™ Perfect-It™ Boat Wax to a 10cm x 10cm area and wipe clean before it dries.
Clean the surface with approved cleaner.
Sand the surface using a DA sander and 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II 80+ grade abrasive discs.
Apply 3M™ Marine Premium Filler.
After it sets, apply dry guide coat and sand with 120+ grade, then finish sanding with 220+ grade.
Clean the surface.
Sand the surface with a DA sander and 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II 120+ grade abrasive discs after dry guide coat application.
Clean the surface.
Ensure surface is dry
Apply masking tapes and film
Mix primer in a 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 cup
Apply primer with a 3M™ Performance Spray Gun
Apply dry guide coat
Sand primer with 320+ grade abrasive discs
Repeat sanding with 400+ grade
Clean surface
Mix marine paint in a 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 cup
Apply marine paint with a 3M™ Performance Spray Gun
Clean the surface with an approved cleaner before any other step.
Compound the surface.
Compound with 3M™ Perfect-It™ Fast Cut Plus Extreme and a 3M™ wool or green foam compounding pad using a rotary polisher at 1400-1800 rpm.
Polish the surface.
Polish the surface with 3M™ Perfect-It™ Ultrafina SE Polish and a 3M™ wool or blue foam polishing pad at 1400-1800 rpm.
Apply 3M™ Perfect-It™ Boat Wax to a 10cm x 10cm area and wipe clean before it dries.
Mix bottom paint in a 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 cup (remove lid filter)
Use a 3M™ Performance Spray Gun, holding it 15cm-20cm from the surface to apply the paint

constraints.expression: The cleaning process must be completed before sanding.
constraints.text: The cleaning process must be completed before sanding.

constraints.expression: Use only approved cleaners for cleaning the composite surface.
constraints.text: Use only approved cleaners for cleaning the composite surface.

constraints.expression: Use 3M Hookit 775L Cubitron II abrasive discs for sanding.
constraints.text: Use 3M Hookit 775L Cubitron II abrasive discs for sanding.

constraints.expression: Ensure an even texture after applying dry guide coat and resanding.
constraints.text: Ensure an even texture after applying dry guide coat and resanding.

constraints.expression: After 30 minutes, wait before feathering the repair.
constraints.text: After 30 minutes, wait before feathering the repair.

constraints.expression: Use 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II abrasive discs for feathering and sanding.
constraints.text: Use 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II abrasive discs for feathering and sanding.

constraints.expression: Fill the cavity with 3M™ Marine Blister Repair Filler or 3M™ Marine Premium Filler.
constraints.text: Fill the cavity with 3M™ Marine Blister Repair Filler or 3M™ Marine Premium Filler.

constraints.expression: Clean the area after applying the filler and before sanding.
constraints.text: Clean the area after applying the filler and before sanding.

constraints.expression: Surface must be dry before masking.
constraints.text: Surface must be dry before masking.

constraints.expression: Use 3M™ Precision Masking Tape for initial masking.
constraints.text: Use 3M™ Precision Masking Tape for initial masking.

constraints.expression: Apply 3M™ Performance Industrial Masking Tape or 3M Scotch® Performance Masking Tape over the 3M™ Precision Masking Tape.
constraints.text: Apply 3M™ Performance Industrial Masking Tape or 3M Scotch® Performance Masking Tape over the 3M™ Precision Masking Tape.

constraints.expression: Mask the entire surface with 3M™ Purple Premium Plus Masking Film.
constraints.text: Mask the entire surface with 3M™ Purple Premium Plus Masking Film.

constraints.expression: Mix gelcoat in a 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 disposable spray cup.
constraints.text: Mix gelcoat in a 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 disposable spray cup.

constraints.expression: Adjust 3M™ Performance Spray Gun settings.
constraints.text: Adjust 3M™ Performance Spray Gun settings.

constraints.expression: Keep spray gun 15cm-20cm from the surface while applying gelcoat.
constraints.text: Keep spray gun 15cm-20cm from the surface while applying gelcoat.

constraints.text: The surface must be cleaned before sanding.

constraints.expression: Use only approved cleaners for cleaning the composite surface.
constraints.text: Use only approved cleaners for cleaning the composite surface.

constraints.expression: Use 3M Hookit 775L Cubitron II abrasives for sanding if the surface has scratches.
constraints.text: Use 3M Hookit 775L Cubitron II abrasives for sanding if the surface has scratches.

constraints.expression: Use a soft interface pad when sanding.
constraints.text: Use a soft interface pad when sanding.

constraints.expression: If the surface is in good condition, use P800 grade 3M Hookit Flexible Abrasive Foam Discs for sanding.
constraints.text: If the surface is in good condition, use P800 grade 3M Hookit Flexible Abrasive Foam Discs for sanding.

constraints.expression: Refine the sand scratch using P1200 grade 3M Hookit Flexible Abrasive Foam Discs.
constraints.text: Refine the sand scratch using P1200 grade 3M Hookit Flexible Abrasive Foam Discs.

constraints.expression: Use 3M Perfect-It Gelcoat Heavy Cutting Compound and a 3M Perfect-It Low Linting Wool Compounding Pad for compounding.

constraints.expression: Use a rotary polishing machine at 1400-1800 rpm for compounding.
constraints.text: Use a rotary polishing machine at 1400-1800 rpm for compounding.

constraints.expression: The surface must be polished before applying the boat wax.
constraints.text: The surface must be polished before applying the boat wax.

constraints.expression: Use only 3M™ Perfect-It™ Gelcoat Compound + Polish for polishing.
constraints.text: Use only 3M™ Perfect-It™ Gelcoat Compound + Polish for polishing.

constraints.expression: Apply boat wax to a 10cm x 10cm area at a time.
constraints.text: Apply boat wax to a 10cm x 10cm area at a time.

constraints.expression: Wipe off the boat wax before it dries.

constraints.expression: After setting, apply dry guide coat and sand with 120+ grade before finishing with 220+ grade.
constraints.text: After setting, apply dry guide coat and sand with 120+ grade before finishing with 220+ grade.

constraints.expression: Clean the surface after each sanding step.
constraints.text: Clean the surface after each sanding step.

constraints.expression: The surface must be dry before applying masking tapes and film.
constraints.text: The surface must be dry before applying masking tapes and film.

constraints.expression: Primer application should be done within 24 hours after primer sanding.
constraints.text: Primer application should be done within 24 hours after primer sanding.

constraints.expression: Use only 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 cups for mixing materials.
constraints.text: Use only 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 cups for mixing materials.

constraints.expression: Keep a minimum distance of 15cm-20cm between the spray gun and the surface during primer application.
constraints.text: Keep a minimum distance of 15cm-20cm between the spray gun and the surface during primer application.

constraints.expression: Choose the dry sanding option if no water is available.
constraints.text: Choose the dry sanding option if no water is available.

constraints.expression: Use a light mist of water when sanding with wet option.
constraints.text: Use a light mist of water when sanding with wet option.

constraints.expression: Use a rotary polisher at 1400-1800 rpm for compounding.

constraints.expression: Use 3M™ Perfect-It™ Ultrafina SE Polish for polishing.

constraints.expression: Use a 3M™ wool or blue foam polishing pad for polishing.

constraints.expression: Use a rotary polisher at 1400-1800 rpm for polishing.

constraints.expression: Apply 3M™ Perfect-It™ Boat Wax only after polishing.

constraints.expression: Wipe off the wax before it dries.

constraints.expression: The 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 cup should be free of impurities before mixing the bottom paint.
